dc_description_s: This point shapefile depicts a collection of various scuba diving sites along the California coast compiled for planning purposes in accordance with the Marine Life Protection Act (MPLA). Sources include PISCO, REEF, www.wannadive.net and www.scubadiving.com. This coverage provides cartographic representation of SCUBA diving sites on the California coast. California Department of Fish and Wildlife Marine Resources Region. (2005). California Coastal Dive Sites, 2005. California Department of Fish and Wildlife. Marine Resources Region. Available at: http://purl.stanford.edu/bv077nh3030. This layer is presented in the WGS84 coordinate system for web display purposes. Downloadable data are provided in native coordinate system or projection.
